scripts.prebuild:manuals: nix build --extra-experimental-features flakes --extra-experimental-features nix-command .#manuals -o ./../result-manuals && mkdir -p ./public/manual && cp --no-preserve=mode,ownership -RL ./../result-manuals/* ./public/manual/
scripts.prebuild:pills: nix build --extra-experimental-features flakes --extra-experimental-features nix-command .#pills -o ./../result-pills && mkdir -p ./public/guides/nix-pills && cp --no-preserve=mode,ownership -RL ./../result-pills/* ./public/guides/nix-pills/
scripts.prebuild:demos: nix build --extra-experimental-features flakes --extra-experimental-features nix-command .#demos -o ./../result-demos && mkdir -p ./public/demos && cp --no-preserve=mode,ownership -RL ./../result-demos/* ./public/demos/
scripts.prebuild: npm run prebuild:manuals && npm run prebuild:pills && npm run prebuild:demos
